channel.title: Bug Alert - Bug Alert Contributors
channel.description: A service for alerting security and IT professionals of high-impact and 0day vulnerabilities.

item.title: Advanced warning: probable remote code execution (RCE) in Spring, an extremely popular Java framework
item.description: An unconfirmed, but probable, remote code execution vulnerability is believed to exist in Spring, an extremely popular Java framework. This issue is likely easily exploited in common configurations. If confirmed, another notice will be sent out with a severity of 'critical'. While unconfirmed, the severity has been assigned 'high'.
item.dc:creator: Bug Alert Contributors

item.title: Unauthenticated user impersonation (auth bypass) in SAP
item.description: A request smuggling issue in SAP NetWeaver, SAP Content Server, and SAP Web Dispatcher allows unauthenticated user impersonation. These systems are commonly Internet-facing. The flaw has been assigned a bug alert severity of 'critical', and the vendor has supplied patches.
item.dc:creator: Bug Alert Contributors

item.title: Local privilege escalation in pkexec, a core Linux system component
item.description: A local privilege escalation bug (from any user to root) has been found polkit's pkexec, and exploit code is available. This binary is a SUID root program available on every major Linux distro, and is most commonly installed if a GUI is present. The flaw has been assigned a bug alert severity of 'very high'.
item.dc:creator: Bug Alert Contributors

item.title: RCE in Log4j
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability has been found in the popular Java logging library Log4j. This issue is easily exploited in common configurations, and has been assigned a bug alert severity of 'critical'.
